message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to consider purchasing this item at a special introductory price of $750000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. My counteroffer is $600000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In order to move forward, I am proposing a new price of $650000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, my counteroffer is $625000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our business interests, I propose a new price of $640000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Based on my budget and the market value, my counteroffer is $630000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I propose a new price of $635000 for the product.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. Based on my financial considerations, my counteroffer is $628000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the quality and unique features of the product, I propose a new price of $633000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Based on my budget and the market value, my final counteroffer is $629000.
